name: One Minute Attack
description:
NOTE i made a bugfix but i cant reupload it so here: https://purple-spider513.itch.io/one-minute-attack-bugfix sorry for the inconvenience

One Minute Attack is a game that was made for the Wowie Jam 4.0.

The theme was collaborate with AI, and Jonas said i can also collaborate with ai to make my game, so yeah. I used a Ai game theme generator, and i simplified it down a little(okay, a lot!) and I got One minute and Revenge, so i have to make those two work together.

Might not get that many points for the theme, but yeah.
